stack:stack.stack:script:
/opt/stack/bin/stack add firewall network=all service=all \ protocol=all action=ACCEPT chain=INPUT rulename=LOOPBACK-NET \ flags="-i lo" comment="Accept all traffic over loopback interface"
/opt/stack/bin/stack add firewall network=all service=ssh \ protocol=tcp action=ACCEPT chain=INPUT rulename=SSH \ flags="-m state --state NEW" \ comment="Accept all ssh traffic on all networks"
/opt/stack/bin/stack add firewall network=all service=all \ protocol=all action=ACCEPT chain=INPUT rulename=PRIVATE-RELATED \ flags="-m state --state RELATED,ESTABLISHED" \ comment="Accept related and established connections"
/opt/stack/bin/stack add firewall network=private service=all \ protocol=all action=ACCEPT chain=INPUT rulename=PRIVATE-NET \ comment="Accept all traffic on private network"
/opt/stack/bin/stack add firewall network=all service=all \ protocol=all action=REJECT chain=INPUT rulename=REJECT-ALL \ comment="Block all traffic"
/opt/stack/bin/stack report host firewall &Kickstart_PrivateHostname; | \ /opt/stack/bin/stack report script > /tmp/do-firewall.sh
chmod a+x /tmp/do-firewall.sh /tmp/do-firewall.sh
